nodes.text: Awglk was a master weaver of the Luminous Mist. Awglk was trapped inside an exogorth so Awglk weaved themself into a cocoon made of Luminous Mist spun into resilient silk containing the hidden dimensions of the universe twisted into yarn strong enough to bind time with one eon being only one second to Awglk. They were then rescued by Luke Skywalker.
